info.description: Apptigent PowerTools Developer Edition is a powerful suite of API endpoints for custom applications running on any stack. Manipulate text, modify collections, format dates and times, convert currency, perform advanced mathematical calculations, shorten URL's, encode strings, convert text to speech, translate content into multiple languages, process images, and more. PowerTools is the ultimate developer toolkit.
info.title: PowerTools Developer

tags.description: Arrays of base values (strings and numbers).

input.description: String containing the text to convert

index.description: Index position for operation (leave blank to specify end of collection)

input.description: Collection of values or objects to modify

item.description: Item (for multiple items, leave blank and use Items)

items.description: Items (Collection, for a single item leave blank and use Item)

trim.description: Trim white space from comparison string

type.description: Type of number - integer or decimal

index.description: Index location to split (leave empty to use Match value)

match.description: String to match (explicit, case-insensitive, leave empty to use Index)

input.description: Collection of strings to be joined

lower.description: Convert strings in collection to lowercase

date.description: Date (yyyy-MM-dd, leave empty for last trading day)

regex.description: Regular expression pattern for matching strings

source.description: String containing the text to be replaced

lower.description: Convert strings to lowercase before comparison

voice.description: Voice locale (must match language of input text)
